titleStmt.title: Abingtons and Alisbvries present miseries both which townes being lately lamentably plundered by Prince Robert and his cavaliers : expressely related as it was certified to some of the honourable the high court of Parliament : and therefore published / by G. H.
titleStmt.author: G. H.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
